generator.title: Prompt Generator
generator.instructionsPlaceholder: Describe what kind of prompt you need to generate...
generator.emptyPreview: Type instructions and generate a prompt to see the preview here.

templates.Examen: I need a prompt to generate multiple-choice, essay, and case-study questions for a university course exam.
templates.Retroalimentacion: I want a prompt to provide detailed, constructive feedback on studentsâ€™ assignments.
templates.Rubrica: I need a prompt to create clear, objective evaluation rubrics for different types of academic work.
templates.Explicacion: I want a prompt to explain complex concepts simply to university students, with analogies and practical examples.
templates.Ejercicios: I need a prompt to design practical, challenging exercises to reinforce student learning.
templates.Investigacion: I want a prompt to guide students in designing research projects, including methodology and structure.

importExport.title: Import/Export Prompts
importExport.dropzone: Drag and drop a JSON file here, or click to select one

syllabus.title: Syllabus Settings
syllabus.info: This generates the syllabus based on the file or current course settings.
syllabus.warning: To regenerate, you must delete the current settings and start over.
syllabus.allowedFormats: Allowed formats: PDF, DOCX, DOC, PPT, PPTX, CSV, XLS
syllabus.result: Syllabus generated; review in ELSA GML via the link.

events.name: Event Name
events.cronHelp: Cron expressions use the format: minute hour day-of-month month day-of-week
events.noParameters: This event has no parameters configured.
events.parameterHelp: This value will replace the parameter in the prompt
events.noParametersDetected: No parameters detected in the selected prompt.
events.errorExtractingParameters: Error extracting parameters from the prompt

home.title: Home
home.welcomeText:
AIRA (Agent Intelligent Networking Academic of CEDIA) is an AI-powered educational platform designed to support personalized learning.

With AIRA, you can access a virtual assistant that answers questions, generates educational content, and helps you organize your learning tasks. The platform is designed to adapt to different roles and needs within the educational environment.

Explore the different functionalities according to your role and make the most of this innovative tool to enhance your educational experience.
